Package controller

Class SystemManager

java.lang.Object
controller.SystemManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SystemManager extends Object implements Serializable
System Manager Manages all system data (holidays, price multipliers and sorting criteria)
Since:
2022-10-30
Version:
1.1
Author:
Roy Leong, Augustine Lee

      public void setSortingCriteria(SortCriteria sc) throws Exception

      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • addHoliday

      public void addHoliday(int year, int month, int day, int hour, int minute) throws Exception

      year - year of holiday
      month - month of holiday
      day - day of holiday
      hour - hour of holiday
      minute - minute of holiday
      Throws:
